name: initializeb2cief
description: Ensures Identity Experience Framework is in place to work with custom policies.
author: DarkLoop

inputs.label: Azure AD B2C Connection
inputs.name: b2cTenantConnection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Connection to the Azure AD B2C tenant. [How to setup your service connection](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=darkloop.b2c-tasks#create-a-connection-to-your-b2c-tenant).

inputs.label: Identity experience framework app name
inputs.name: iefAppName
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the application to use as the Identity Experience Framework.

inputs.label: Identity experience framework ID variable name
inputs.name: iefAppIdVariable
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the variable to apply the ID of the application to use as the Identity Experience Framework so that it can be used in next steps.

inputs.label: Identity experience framework proxy app name
inputs.name: iefProxyAppName
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the application to use as the Proxy Identity Experience Framework.

inputs.label: Identity experience framework proxy ID variable name
inputs.name: iefProxyAppIdVariable
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the variable to apply the ID of the application to use as the Proxy Identity Experience Framework so that it can be used in next steps.

inputs.label: Tokens signing key container name
inputs.name: tokenSigningKey
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the container hosting the key to sign tokens. If a name other than the default value is used it will have to be configured in the policies.

inputs.label: Tokens encryption key container name
inputs.name: tokenEncryptionKey
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the container hosting the key to encrypt tokens. If a name other than the default value is used it will have to be configured in the policies.

inputs.label: Extensions app object ID variable name
inputs.name: extObjectId
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the variable to assign the object ID of the extensions application.

inputs.label: Extensions app ID variable name
inputs.name: extAppId
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the variable to assign the app ID of the extensions application.

instanceNameFormat: Ensure B2C IEF setup on tenant
